products.name: YG-T92
products.description: Compact real-time GPS tracker for vehicles, assets, and personnel.
products.fullDescription: Our GPS Tracker Hardware offers precise real-time location tracking for vehicles, assets, and personnel. Equipped with high-sensitivity GPS modules and GSM connectivity, this device ensures continuous monitoring and geofencing capabilities anywhere worldwide. Compact and durable, it is ideal for fleet management, logistics, personal safety, and asset security.

products.name: YG-D3 GPS Tracker
products.description: 4G CAT1 wireless rechargeable GPS tracker with GPS, Beidou, WiFi, and LBS positioning.
products.fullDescription: The YG-D3 is an advanced 4G CAT1 wireless GPS tracking device featuring multiple positioning technologies including GPS, Beidou, WiFi, and LBS. Equipped with a rechargeable battery for flexible installation options. Perfect for comprehensive location tracking with enhanced accuracy through multiple positioning systems.

products.name: Teltonika FMC130

Designed for demanding applications requiring precise tracking, data logging, and integration with various sensors and peripherals. Ideal for commercial fleet management and advanced telematics solutions.

products.name: Teltonika ALL-CAN300
products.description: CAN bus adapter designed to acquire data from special transport, agriculture, construction, light vehicles, vans, trucks and buses.
products.fullDescription: ALL-CAN300 is designed to acquire data from special transport, agriculture and construction, transport, light vehicles, vans, trucks and buses. With ALL-CAN300 you can easily get basic and additional 100 parameters from on-board computer such as door status, AdBlue level, Oil pressure/level, engine lifetime, airbag. Supported by FMB1YX, FMU1YX, FMC1YX, FMM1YX, FM36YX, FM63YX, FMB64X, FMC64X, FMM64X series.

products.name: Teltonika CAN-200
products.description: CAN bus adapter designed to acquire data from special transport, agriculture, construction, light vehicles, vans, trucks and buses.
products.fullDescription: LV-CAN200 is designed to acquire data from light vehicles, vans, trucks, buses. With LV-CAN200 you can easily get basic parameters such as mileage, fuel level, fuel consumption, RPM, coolant temperature from on-board computer

products.description: CAN bus adapter designed to acquire data from special transport, agriculture, construction, light vehicles, vans, trucks and buses.

products.name: Mini Pin Fuse Adapter
products.description: Add a protected circuit without cutting wires. Perfect for dash cams, GPS units, and phone chargers.
products.fullDescription: Easily power aftermarket accessories without cutting or splicing wires using this Micro2 Fuse Tap Adapter. Designed for vehicles with Micro2 fuse types, this compact and reliable solution allows you to safely add a new circuit while maintaining protection for the original one.

specs.material: High-quality ABS plastic housing with pure copper connectors
specs.design: Dual-slot for protecting both original and new circuits
features: Dual-circuit design lets you piggyback a new accessory circuit alongside an existing one, both protected by their own fuses
Compatible with Mini fuses in modern vehicles
Plug-and-play installation for easy setup without damaging factory wiring
Secure fuse holders for safe connection

products.name: Micro Low Profile Fuse
products.description: Compact, space-saving automotive fuse featuring two fuse elements in a single package for dual-circuit protection.
products.fullDescription: An impressive selection of Low Profile, Micro 2 and Micro 3 blade fuses. Low Profile fuses have a smaller size which allows for more space and weight saving. Micro Blade Fuses (with 2 or 3 prongs) are the smallest blade fuses around.Each tray contains a Plan-O-Graph indicating part numbers and product information for easy and quick reordering.Compartments are designed so products can easily be scooped out.Assortments come with locking hinge and handle for easy portability between workstations.

specs.design: Dual Circuit Protection - Contains two fuse elements in one body to protect two separate circuits
specs.size: Compact Design - Space-saving footprint for modern vehicle fuse boxes
specs.color_coding: Standardized Color Coding - Available in industry-standard amperages with matching color identification

products.name: Standard Fuse
products.description: Widely used automotive fuse type (ATO/ATC) designed to protect electrical circuits in vehicles.
products.fullDescription: The Standard Blade Fuse—also known as ATO or ATC fuse—is a widely used automotive fuse type designed to protect electrical circuits in vehicles. With a simple plug-in blade design, it provides reliable overcurrent protection for components like lights, radios, and central locking systems. These fuses are color-coded by amperage rating and are easy to identify and replace.

specs.color_coding: Color-coded by amperage rating for easy identification

products.name: Micro 2-Fuse
products.description: Low-profile, miniaturized automotive blade fuse designed to protect modern vehicle electrical systems.
products.fullDescription: The Micro2 Fuse is a low-profile, miniaturized automotive blade fuse designed to protect modern vehicle electrical systems. With its compact size and efficient design, it is ideal for newer vehicles that require space-saving components. Micro2 fuses provide reliable circuit protection and are used in various low-voltage applications across cars, trucks, and motorcycles.

specs.size: Compact Size - Smaller than standard and mini blade fuses, ideal for high-density fuse boxes in modern vehicles
specs.design: Blade-Type Design - Easy plug-in installation with solid and stable connection
specs.color_coding: Color-Coded by Amperage - Available in multiple ratings (5A to 30A), each with standard color coding for quick identification
features: Compact Size: Smaller than standard and mini blade fuses—ideal for high-density fuse boxes in modern vehicles
Blade-Type Design: Easy plug-in installation with solid and stable connection
Color-Coded by Amperage: Available in multiple ratings (5A to 30A), each with standard color coding for quick identification

products.name: Mini Fuse
products.description: 32V MINI Auto Blade Fuses provide reliable circuit protection for automotive and electronic applications.
products.fullDescription: These 32V MINI Auto Blade Fuses provide reliable circuit protection for automotive and electronic applications. Compact and easy to install, they are designed to protect wiring and electrical equipment from overcurrent in 12V or 24V systems. Compatible with most modern vehicles, these fuses are ideal for replacement or OEM use.

specs.material: High-quality zinc alloy blades and transparent plastic housing

products.name: Drexia 1W-H0-04P 13.56mhz RFID Reader
products.description: High-frequency 13.56MHz RFID reader designed for contactless identification and access control applications.
products.fullDescription: The Drexia 1W-H0-04P is a professional 13.56MHz RFID reader designed for reliable contactless identification and access control systems. Operating at the standard 13.56MHz frequency, it provides fast and secure reading of RFID tags and cards. Ideal for access control, attendance tracking, and secure authentication solutions in various commercial and industrial applications.

features: Compatible with standard RFID tags and cards
Access control and attendance tracking ready

products.name: I BUTTON CC READER
products.description: Contact-based data reader designed to interface with iButton devices via a simple and durable touch-contact mechanism.
products.fullDescription: The iButton CC Reader is a contact-based data reader designed to interface with iButton devices, such as the DS1990A, via a simple and durable touch-contact mechanism. It is commonly used in access control systems, attendance tracking, vending machines, and secure authentication solutions. The reader's circular contact surface allows quick and reliable reading of iButton data when the key is touched to the reader head. Compact, rugged, and easy to install, it supports reliable one-wire communication and long service life.

specs.design: Circular contact surface for touch-contact reading

products.name: Teltonika: iButton Reader
products.description: Compact and reliable identification accessory designed for use with Teltonika GPS tracking devices for secure driver authentication.
products.fullDescription: The Teltonika iButton Reader is a compact and reliable identification accessory designed for use with Teltonika GPS tracking devices. It allows for secure driver authentication by reading unique codes from iButton keys (Dallas keys), making it an ideal solution for fleet management, access control, and vehicle authorization. The reader is easy to install, durable, and provides a fast and contact-based method for driver recognition.

products.name: Arkangel R-1701 /12V
products.description: Standard 5-pin relay commonly used in automotive electrical systems. Allows a low-current circuit to control a high-current load.
products.fullDescription: The Arkangel R-1701 /12V is a standard 5-pin relay commonly used in automotive electrical systems. It allows a low-current circuit (like a control switch) to control a high-current load (like headlights, fuel pumps, etc.). This reliable relay is designed for 12V automotive applications and provides safe and efficient switching of high-current circuits.

features: Suitable for headlights, fuel pumps, and accessories

products.name: Arkangel R-1701 /24V
products.description: Standard 5-pin relay commonly used in automotive electrical systems. Allows a low-current circuit to control a high-current load.
products.fullDescription: The Arkangel R-1701 /24V is a standard 5-pin relay commonly used in automotive electrical systems. It allows a low-current circuit (like a control switch) to control a high-current load (like headlights, fuel pumps, etc.). This reliable relay is designed for 24V automotive applications, making it ideal for commercial vehicles, trucks, and heavy-duty applications.

features: Suitable for commercial vehicles and trucks

products.name: Universal 5-Pin Automotive Relay Harness
products.description: Universal 5-pin relay socket pre-wired with color-coded leads for quick and secure connections in automotive installations.
products.fullDescription: Simplify your automotive or electronic installations with this universal 5-pin relay socket. Designed to fit standard SPDT (Single Pole Double Throw) relays, this durable socket comes pre-wired with color-coded leads for quick and secure connections. Ideal for use with 12V 40/30A relays in vehicle lighting, security systems, or accessory circuits, it provides a clean and professional wiring solution.

specs.compatibility: Standard SPDT (Single Pole Double Throw) relays

products.name: Universal 4-Pin Automotive Relay Harness
products.description: Universal 4-pin relay socket pre-wired with color-coded leads for quick and secure connections in automotive installations.
products.fullDescription: Simplify your automotive or electronic installations with this universal 4-pin relay socket. Designed to fit standard SPST (Single Pole Single Throw) relays, this durable socket comes pre-wired with color-coded leads for quick and secure connections. Ideal for use with 12V 40/30A relays in vehicle lighting, security systems, or accessory circuits, it provides a clean and professional wiring solution.

specs.compatibility: Standard SPST (Single Pole Single Throw) relays
